text: Whitney is an unincorporated community in St. Clair County, Alabama, United States. ==History== Whitney was named for Charles Whitney, a member of the Alabama Legislature following the Civil War. A post office was established under the name Whitney in 1875 and was in operation until 1967. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in St. Clair County, Alabama Category:Unincorporated communities in Alabama
title: Whitney, Alabama
